response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product worth $10,000 at a competitive rate. I trust you will find this offer compelling and hope to hear from you soon. If you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Best regards, Alice.", "product_price": 9500}
